title: No apple for Johnny
creator_credit: John Weldon, Robert Verrall, Dorothy Courtois, Wolf Koenig and National Film Board of Canada
brief_description: This documentary cartoon is the visual enactment of the year-long obstacle course run by a teacher trainee. Rich in humour and anecdote, it is a comedy of educational manners seen through the autobiographical eye of a trainee-turned-filmmaker.
